# <a name="read-receipts"></a><span data-ttu-id="d651a-102">Potvrdenia o prečítaní</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d651a-102">Read receipts</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d651a-103">Vyžiadať potvrdenie o prečítaní alebo doručení správy:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d651a-103">To request a read receipt or a delivery receipt for your message:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="d651a-104">Vyberte tri bodky</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d651a-104">Select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="d651a-105">v hornej časti správy skladať table.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d651a-105">at the top of the message compose pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="d651a-106">Vyberte **Zobraziť možnosti správ**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d651a-106">Select **Show message options**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="d651a-107">Vyberte **prečítaní** alebo **žiadosť o doručenie**, alebo oboje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d651a-107">Select **Request a read receipt** or **Request a delivery receipt**, or both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d651a-108">Ak chcete vybrať, ako program Outlook reaguje na žiadosti o potvrdenie o doručení, prejdite na</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d651a-108">To choose how Outlook responds to read receipt requests, go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="d651a-109">**Nastavenia** > **Zobraziť Outlook nastavenia** > **spracovanie správy**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d651a-109">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **Message handling**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d651a-110">Ďalšie informácie nájdete v [potvrdení o prečítaní programu Outlook na webe](https://support.office.com/article/e09af74d-3519-45fc-a680-37a538a92157).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d651a-110">For more information, see [Read receipts in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/e09af74d-3519-45fc-a680-37a538a92157).</span></span>
